addon.title: DOOM Resource Pack (jDRP)
addon.notes: Unzip this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: DOOM Classic Music
addon.description: The original DOOM midis recorded on a genuine Roland Sound Canvas SC-155.
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: DOOM2 Classic Music
addon.description: The original DOOM2 midis recorded on a genuine Roland Sound Canvas SC-155.
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: TNT Lorcan Remix
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: Sycraft Remixes
addon.description: DOOM, DOOMII and Final DOOM music remixed by Sycraft.
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: DOOM High-Resolution Texture Project
addon.description: High-resolution textures for all versions of DOOM.

addon.title: DOOM High-Resolution User interface Pack
addon.description: High-resolution user interface textures for all version of DOOM.
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: DOOM High-Quality Sound Pack
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: Slide's Skyboxes
addon.description: 3d model skies by Slide for all versions of DOOM.
addon.notes: Move these packs into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: Heretic Resource Pack (jHRP)
addon.description: 3D models, high-resolution user interface and textures.
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: Hexen Mage Weapons Pack
addon.description: Veirdo's high-quality 3D models and particle effects for the Mage player class (plus a few extra goodies).
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: Hexen Community Compilation Pack (jXCCP)
addon.description: 3D models and particle effects, high-resolution textures and UI. Veirdo's boxed compilation of every community resource known to man.
addon.notes: Unzip this pack into the Snowberry addon folder

addon.title: Hexen Texture Pack
addon.notes: Move this pack into the Snowberry addon folder
